Once upon a time, in a land where the sun kissed the peaks, there stood a mountain named Montara. Unlike other mountains, Montara had a secret passion: dancing. Every night, when the moonlight bathed her in silver, she would sway her snow-capped peaks and shimmy her rocky slopes. The forest animals would gather, enchanted by her rhythm, while the rivers flowed in sync with her moves. One fateful night, a storm threatened to silence her. But with a twirl and a leap, Montara summoned the winds to join her dance, transforming the tempest into a beautiful ballet, celebrating her love for life.
